verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician עַלְמ֥וּת לַבֵּ֗ן <S%H4192><s%> death מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David אוֹדֶ֣ה <S%H3034><s%> I will praise יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> [thee] O LORD בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> with my whole heart אֲ֝סַפְּרָ֗ה <S%H5608><s%> I will shew forth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6381><s%> all thy marvellous works

אֶשְׂמְחָ֣ה <S%H8055><s%> I will be glad וְאֶעֶלְצָ֣ה <S%H5970><s%> and rejoice בָ֑ךְ אֲזַמְּרָ֖ה <S%H2167><s%> in thee I will sing praise שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> to thy name עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> O thou most High

בְּשׁוּב־ <S%H7725><s%> are turned אוֹיְבַ֥י <S%H341><s%> When mine enemies אָח֑וֹר <S%H268><s%> back יִכָּשְׁל֥וּ <S%H3782><s%> they shall fall וְ֝יֹאבְד֗וּ <S%H6><s%> and perish מִפָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> at thy presence

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָ֭שִׂיתָ <S%H6213><s%> For thou hast maintained מִשְׁפָּטִ֣י <S%H4941><s%> my right וְדִינִ֑י <S%H1779><s%> and my cause יָשַׁ֥בְתָּ <S%H3427><s%> thou satest לְ֝כִסֵּ֗א <S%H3678><s%> in the throne שׁוֹפֵ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> judging צֶֽדֶק׃ <S%H6664><s%> right

גָּעַ֣רְתָּ <S%H1605><s%> Thou hast rebuked ג֭וֹיִם <S%H1471><s%> the heathen אִבַּ֣דְתָּ <S%H6><s%> thou hast destroyed רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> the wicked שְׁמָ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> their name מָ֝חִ֗יתָ <S%H4229><s%> thou hast put out לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> and ever

הָֽאוֹיֵ֨ב ׀ <S%H341><s%> O thou enemy תַּ֥מּוּ <S%H8552><s%> end חֳרָב֗וֹת <S%H2723><s%> destructions לָ֫נֶ֥צַח <S%H5331><s%> are come to a perpetual וְעָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> the cities נָתַ֑שְׁתָּ <S%H5428><s%> and thou hast destroyed אָבַ֖ד <S%H6><s%> is perished זִכְרָ֣ם <S%H2143><s%> their memorial הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> with them

וַֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> But the LORD לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever יֵשֵׁ֑ב <S%H3427><s%> shall endure כּוֹנֵ֖ן <S%H3559><s%> he hath prepared לַמִּשְׁפָּ֣ט <S%H4941><s%> for judgment כִּסְאֽוֹ׃ <S%H3678><s%> his throne

וְה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> and He יִשְׁפֹּֽט־ <S%H8199><s%> And he shall judge תֵּבֵ֥ל <S%H8398><s%> the world בְּצֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> in righteousness יָדִ֥ין <S%H1777><s%> he shall minister judgment לְ֝אֻמִּ֗ים <S%H3816><s%> to the people בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <S%H4339><s%> in uprightness

וִ֘יהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מִשְׂגָּ֣ב <S%H4869><s%> also will be a refuge לַדָּ֑ךְ <S%H1790><s%> for the oppressed מִ֝שְׂגָּ֗ב <S%H4869><s%> a refuge לְעִתּ֥וֹת <S%H6256><s%> in times בַּצָּרָֽה׃ <S%H6869><s%> of trouble

וְיִבְטְח֣וּ <S%H982><s%> will put their trust בְ֭ךָ יוֹדְעֵ֣י <S%H3045><s%> And they that know שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <S%H8034><s%> thy name כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not עָזַ֖בְתָּ <S%H5800><s%> hast not forsaken דֹרְשֶׁ֣יךָ <S%H1875><s%> them that seek יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> in thee for thou LORD

זַמְּר֗וּ <S%H2167><s%> Sing praises לַ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> which dwelleth צִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> in Zion הַגִּ֥ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> declare בָ֝עַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> among the people עֲלִֽילוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H5949><s%> his doings

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for דֹרֵ֣שׁ <S%H1875><s%> When he maketh inquisition דָּ֭מִים <S%H1818><s%> for blood אוֹתָ֣ם <S%H853><s%> זָכָ֑ר <S%H2142><s%> he remembereth לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not שָׁ֝כַ֗ח <S%H7911><s%> them he forgetteth צַעֲקַ֥ת <S%H6818><s%> not the cry [עֲנִיִּים כ] (עֲנָוִֽים׃ <S%H6041><s%> afflicted ק)

חָֽנְנֵ֬נִי <S%H2603><s%> Have mercy יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> upon me O LORD רְאֵ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> consider עָ֭נְיִי <S%H6040><s%> my trouble מִשֹּׂנְאָ֑י <S%H8130><s%> [which I suffer] of them that hate מְ֝רוֹמְמִ֗י <S%H7311><s%> me thou that liftest me up מִשַּׁ֥עֲרֵי <S%H8179><s%> from the gates מָֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> of death

לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of אֲסַפְּרָ֗ה <S%H5608><s%> That I may shew forth כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all תְּהִלָּ֫תֶ֥יךָ <S%H8416><s%> all thy praise בְּשַֽׁעֲרֵ֥י <S%H8179><s%> in the gates בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the daughter צִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion אָ֝גִ֗ילָה <S%H1523><s%> I will rejoice בִּישׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3444><s%> in thy salvation

טָבְע֣וּ <S%H2883><s%> are sunk down ג֭וֹיִם <S%H1471><s%> The heathen בְּשַׁ֣חַת <S%H7845><s%> in the pit עָשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> [that] they made בְּרֶֽשֶׁת־ <S%H7568><s%> in the net ז֥וּ <S%H2098><s%> which טָ֝מָ֗נוּ <S%H2934><s%> they hid נִלְכְּדָ֥ה <S%H3920><s%> taken רַגְלָֽם׃ <S%H7272><s%> is their own foot

נ֤וֹדַ֨ע ׀ <S%H3045><s%> is known יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מִשְׁפָּ֪ט <S%H4941><s%> [by] the judgment עָ֫שָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> [which] he executeth בְּפֹ֣עַל <S%H6467><s%> in the work כַּ֭פָּיו <S%H3709><s%> of his own hands נוֹקֵ֣שׁ <S%H5367><s%> is snared רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> the wicked הִגָּי֥וֹן <S%H1902><s%> Higgaion סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

יָשׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> shall be turned רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> The wicked לִשְׁא֑וֹלָה <S%H7585><s%> into hell כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גּ֝וֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> [and] all the nations שְׁכֵחֵ֥י <S%H7913><s%> that forget אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not לָ֭נֶצַח <S%H5331><s%> shall not alway יִשָּׁכַ֣ח <S%H7911><s%> be forgotten אֶבְי֑וֹן <S%H34><s%> For the needy תִּקְוַ֥ת <S%H8615><s%> the expectation [עֲנָוִים כ] (עֲ֝נִיִּ֗ים <S%H6035><s%> humble ק) תֹּאבַ֥ד <S%H6><s%> shall [not] perish לָעַֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> for ever

קוּמָ֣ה <S%H6965><s%> Arise יְ֭הוָה <S%H3069><s%> God אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יָעֹ֣ז <S%H5810><s%> prevail אֱנ֑וֹשׁ <S%H376><s%> he יִשָּׁפְט֥וּ <S%H8199><s%> be judged ג֝וֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> let the heathen עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> in thy sight

שִׁ֘יתָ֤ה <S%H7896><s%> Put יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3069><s%> God מוֹרָ֗ה <S%H4172><s%> dread לָ֫הֶ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> like יֵדְע֥וּ <S%H3045><s%> may know גוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> [that] the nations אֱנ֖וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> themselves [to be but] men הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like סֶּֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah
